title: dynamic queue was a fucking failure
body: im tired of these queue times, they are longer than pre nerf fiddles fear, morgana Q, and teleport delay put together.

replies.body: That's what happens when you queue mid lane, top, or jungle. ADC is a relatively decent queue time I think, but if you want a really good queue time that's ranges between 15 secs and 2 mins, then you should either queue support or fill.
I will take 2 minute longer queues at peak hours over being forced to play soraka jungle for 20 minutes, thanks riot.

The longer queue times are due to the new Champion Select (where you can select your preferred roles), not Dynamic Queue (premade groups).

Dynamic Queue was a failure for different reasons, but it had little to do with the queue times.
So, they're longer than 10 seconds? Yes that's correct.
